stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Dr. Steen is a great professor, she is very understanding and willing to help you. Don\'t miss class because you are only hurting yourself. You get what you work for in this class, she is not there to baby you.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  TEST HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: This class is pretty difficult and dominates any other class you take. She does not drop the lowest test score, and you MUST ask her questions during lectures. She can be very discouraging at times, she loves mentioning how you\'re gonna fail if you don\'t do a certain thing. HEAVY on notes and I highly recommend using voice memo to record.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Dr. Steen is one of my inspiration! She\'s very passionate with her career and very enthusiastic with students as well. I wish I could take her both in Biol 243 and Biol 244. She also teaches AFCI class so I\'m pretty excited about that. 6 stars!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Taking AFCI with her was a relief. She was crystal clear on exactly what you needed to do to pass the class and didn\'t give you extra, meaningless work. The class itself is not fun but Professor Steen made it bearable and essentially a check list. If you do what she tells you to, you\'ll be golden. Took all of the guess work out.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Dr. Steen is amazing! She makes Biology interesting and she tells many stories to make it easier! She teaches off of powerpoint slides, and there are 4 exams. Lecture quizzes are also easy! Make sure to pay attention in lab and ask questions! If you study and participate, you are bound to make an A!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: TEST HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: You have three quizzes every week. One lecture, two in lab. The tests aren\'t fun either, because while they are multiple choice E on everyone one of them is the answer is not present, so it\'s hard not to doubt yourself. If you take her, you better study your butt off before every test. Like you think you know it - that\'s not good enough.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Test and lectures do not match. Lectures emphasize the wrong material. Lab grade really helps your grade and there are 3 quizzes a week. I wouldn\'t take her again. She offers appointment times but she\'s very unapproachable.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Very good professor. All the test material comes from the Powerpoints and the lectures. If you go to class/lab, and study then you\'ll do fine. There are a lot of quizzes and lab reports. The final was easy though.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: I loved Professor Steen, she was incredibly helpful and made lectures interesting. Didn\'t really need the textbook at all, just take good notes and pay attention and you will get a good grade! Attendance is optional but I wouldn\'t miss too many lectures and DO NOT MISS LAB. Definitely would recommend!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Very Willing To help. Great teacher. Explains content as much as possible if you ask. You will get your money\'s worth as far as learning goes. Don\'t mess around and you\'ll do great.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: She is such a great teacher. I recommend if you want to learn.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: She tells you from the beginning DO NOT get behind. In her class quizzes count they can be what keeps you from that A. She welcomes and answers any questions.So if its unclear ask her. She will help you out of class as well. Her notes she gives are organized and if you pay attention and take notes the book is just back up.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Her grades on lab reports are highly opinionated. She won\'t help you out on your grades. She failed me with a 69.2 final average despite I always attended the class and did all that was required. Took Dr. Shealy the next year and got a B. She still has that I\'m young and know everything personailty about her. I would not recommend taking her.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Dr. Steen is awesome! Her class isn\'t a cake walk, so if you\'re looking for an easy A look elsewhere. She was so helpful to me though. She responds to emails proptly and would always grill and drill me before an exam to make sure I knew my material. And she DOES care about her students. She\'s super funny, nice and smart! Great professor!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Horrible class. Doesn\'t take attendance but there\'s always work to do and no make-ups. 7 lecture quizzes, 6 lab quizzes, lab reports after every lab, 5 exams. Can\'t pass without reading the book.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Very straight forward class but by no means an easy A. HEAVY on notes but she never asks anything on tests or quizzes that wasn\'t specifically in the notes. Class is 4 tests which are 80 multiple choice and 2 essay each. Questions on final are copied and pasted directly from first 4 tests. Doesn\'t take attendance but you WILL fail if you miss class

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Heavy Lecture, Lots of notes. Very straight forward and willing to help. Very good teacher, responds well to questions in class. Challenging but reasonably so. Do not take if you\'re looking for an easy A. But a good grade is not impossible.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: This teacher is just horrible... she doesnt care about students grades or personal problems as if she doesnt have any... But will help you at her advantage... I would only recommend you take her with caution and if you are really serious about this class!!!!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Class can be hard at times, but she is willing to help if you ask. Every thing on the test is in the book or on the powerpoint.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (6)  Gives good feedback (4)  Tough Grader (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: I have an A in her class. She is a good teacher and will help you outside of class if you don\'t get it in class. I don\'t know what these people are talking about?? If you just study, she even gives you the answers to quizzes and almost tells you exactly what to write on lab reports.
